Title: Relates to mandatory acceptance of empty beverage containers
Summary: Provides that businesses of less than two thousand square feet or less than five thousand square feet when licensed under article 20-c of the agriculture and markets law and not located in the city of New York shall be exempt from the mandatory acceptance of empty beverage containers.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-1007, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to mandatory acceptance of empty beverage containers
